paper_abstract: A method to construct Boolean functions with maximum algebraic immunity have been proposed in [1]. Based on that method, we propose a different method to construct Boolean functions on even variables with maximum algebraic immunity in this letter. By counting on our construction, a lower bound of the number of such Boolean functions is derived, which is the best among all the existing lower bounds.
paper_title: Constructing and Counting Boolean Functions on Even Variables with Maximum Algebraic Immunity
